response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item boasts a unique blend of innovation, quality, and functionality, making it an unparalleled investment for those seeking the best in their field. We are offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $750,000, reflecting its true value and ensuring you receive the best possible deal. Should you choose to accept this offer, you'll not only acquire a valuable asset but also become part of our esteemed clientele. Please let us know if you have any questions or require further information about the product. We look forward to the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 750000}
